mapper.select: SELECT D.DEPTNO, D.DEPTNAME, D.DEPTSTATUS, COUNT(A.EMPNO) AS COUNT FROM DEPARTMENT D LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE A ON (D.DEPTNO=A.DEPTNO) GROUP BY D.DEPTNO, D.DEPTNAME, D.DEPTSTATUS ORDER BY D.DEPTNO
mapper.update: UPDATE DEPARTMENT SET DEPTNAME = #{deptName}, deptStatus = #{status} WHERE DEPTNO=#{deptNo}
